text: āṉāl, (napiyē!) Umatu iṟaivaṉ mikka maṉṉippavaṉum, karuṇaiyuṭaiyavaṉum āvāṉ. Avarkaḷ ceyyum (tīya) ceyaliṉ kāraṇamāka avaṉ avarkaḷai (uṭaṉukkuṭaṉ) piṭippatāka iruntāl ituvarai avarkaḷai vētaṉai ceytēyiruppāṉ. Eṉiṉum, (avarkaḷait taṇṭikka) avarkaḷukku oru tavaṇai uṇṭu. Ataṟkup piṉṉar avarkaḷ tappa vaḻi kāṇamāṭṭārkaḷ
